thread.title: Sony Xperia Z5 Family Confirmed for Unveil at IFA 2015
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia Z5 Family Confirmed for Unveil at IFA 2015 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sony Xperia Z5 Family Confirmed for Unveil at IFA 2015
text: If you still have any doubts that Sony will be launching a new Xperia lineup of smartphones, then the following news might convince you that the Japanese company will indeed reveal the Xperia Z5 family very soon. Sony has already confirmed that its press conference during IFA 2015 trade fair will take place on September 2, which means we're only a few hours away from the announcements. A new poster showcased at Sony's booth at IFA 2015 proves that the company is readying... Â»
